charges.charge_description: Transporting undocumented aliens w/in the U.S. PENALTY: Not more than 10 yrs and/or $250,000; $100 each count; Not more than 3 yrs SRT. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 14 mos to serve; 3 yrs tsr, usual terms apply; DNA sample; $100 cvf; fine waived; drug/alcohol treatment in/out patient; advised of right to appeal. Pled true to viols 1 and 2, Court finds deft has violated srt, Modified: Drug inpatient treatment for up to 6 mos; continue under the same terms and conditions as previously imposed; remain in custody until placement is available; advised of right to appeal. Pled true to viols 1 and 2, Court finds deft has violated srt as to viol 1 and 2, but makes no finding as to steeling from vending machine, Revoked: 8 mos to serve; srt terminated; advised of right to appeal
